dmca.title: Copyright infringement by your customer
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: John LeBlanc [mailto:jwleblanc@earthlink.net] 
Sent: Wednesday, April 06, 2005 12:24 PM
To: abuse@theplanet.com; legal@theplanet.com
Cc: John LeBlanc; escamoteurettes@hotmail.com
Subject: Copyright infringement by your customer

Good morning.

I just spoke to someone in your NOC who was very helpful in pointing me in
the proper direction to address this.

Your customer -- easymentalism.com -- is copying content from my website --
http://www.escamoteurettes.com -- and serving that content up from his own
site without permission or even attribution. (Not that attribution would
make me feel much better about this.)

He has never contacted me for permission and I have not granted him
permission.

I sent him two emails politely asking him to remove my content immediately
and they have both gone unanswered. And my content is still on his web site
as of today.

I attempted to do a WHOIS to contact him via his admin and technical contact
details, but he has opted to take advantage of that "wonderful" new Whois
Privacy Protection service offered by his registrar, RegisterFly.com. And
they've not been much help so far.

I really don't want to create an international incident or threaten anyone
-- I just want him to stop copying my content on his web site. That's all.

Can you help? Please?

Here are examples -- my web site URL, then his:

http://www.escamoteurettes.com/blog/index.php?p=129
http://www.easymentalism.com/mentalism/two-freebies-to-occupy-your-time/

http://www.escamoteurettes.com/blog/index.php?p=127
http://www.easymentalism.com/mentalism/some-sufficiently-advanced-technology
/

http://www.escamoteurettes.com/blog/index.php?p=121
http://www.easymentalism.com/mentalism/share-and-share-alike/

http://www.escamoteurettes.com/blog/index.php?p=122
http://www.easymentalism.com/mentalism/more-history-of-magic/

http://www.escamoteurettes.com/blog/index.php?p=119
http://www.easymentalism.com/mentalism/speaking-freely/

http://www.escamoteurettes.com/blog/index.php?p=118
http://www.easymentalism.com/mentalism/you%e2%80%99re-fired/

http://www.escamoteurettes.com/blog/index.php?p=116
http://www.easymentalism.com/mentalism/something-to-say/

http://www.escamoteurettes.com/blog/index.php?p=105
http://www.easymentalism.com/mentalism/one-more-blog/

http://www.escamoteurettes.com/blog/index.php?p=103
http://www.easymentalism.com/mentalism/spreading-the-love/

http://www.escamoteurettes.com/blog/index.php?p=102
http://www.easymentalism.com/mentalism/getting-there-is-half-the-fun/

If you would like to contact me for additional details, please feel free to
do so. My office number is: 337-988-6459

Thanks.

John LeBlanc
Lafayette, LA
337-988-6459
